campaign.description: Identifier of the particular campaign that led to the download of the product.

content.description: Identifier to indicate the particular link within a campaign.

dltoken.description: Unique token created at Firefox download time, see bug 1757451

medium.description: Category of the source, such as 'organic' for a search engine.

source.description: Referring partner domain, when install happens via a known partner.

browser_session_id.description: A mirror of the browser sessionId, as defined in https://github.com/mozilla-services/mozilla-pipeline-schemas/blob/main/schemas/telemetry/main/main.4.schema.json

event_context.description: A string that describes the context about this event

experiments.description: An object to record all active experiments, experiments IDs are stored as keys, and the value object stores the branch information. Example: {"experiment_1": {"branch": "control"}, "experiment_2": {"branch": "treatment"}}. This deprecates the "shield_id" used in activity-stream and messaging-system.

shield_id.description: [DEPRECATED]: use `experiments` instead. A semicolon separated string to store a list of Shield study IDs
